lead_paragraph: On their Web site, the rebels, who are also fighting government troops, said they were reiterating “support for dialogue and a language of understanding to resolve all differences.”
snippet: On their Web site, the rebels, who are also fighting government troops, said they were reiterating “support for dialogue and a language of understanding to resolve all differences.”

headline.main: Yemen: Shiite Rebels Offer Talks to Saudis
headline.print_headline: Yemen: Shiite Rebels Offer Talks To Saudis
